text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! No waaay! I'm DEAD!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That explosive voice... Turning my<n>head towards the sound,
I see Tosen<n>Jordan and her friend staring at their<n>phones
and laughing wildly.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friend
text_block_list.text: Check this out, Jordan! This one's<n>sooo good!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Omigosh, you're right! I can't!Ahaha, my sides!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Not sure what's going on, but it looks<n>like she's enjoying...
something? I'll<n>have to ask her about it later.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I told you, it's California Fuji Izumi.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You know, the comedian? The one<n>doing all those stupid
gags going viral<n>on UmaTok?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
"Gotcha! That there's the last straw!"<n>Come on, you've
heard that line,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Seriously? Then... What about this...<n>Pfft, hehe...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
"Popping, ping popping!" Ahhh! I<n>can't! It's too good!
Bahaha!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Oh, come on! If you don't laughtoo, that's, like, peak cringe!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
But seriously, you didn't know that<n>one either? Do you, like,
never go on<n>social media or something?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ohhh? Well, I guess this comediandid just start trending recently.How about non-comedy stuff, then?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Stuff like... this, maybe? ♪

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Or maybe this? Isn't this the cutest?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Uhhh, no? Or, like, not exactly? Wow...<n>You really don't know
any of these,<n>huh?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
If you don't know these UmaToks,<n>what are you even
watching? What do<n>you do for fun?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thinking about it, I realize my<n>schedule has been so busy
that I no<n>longer keep up with entertainment<n>much...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I don't watch much TV, but... I<n>should recognize the big
names. What<n>shows do you like?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I try to come up with a few names,<n>but realize I haven't
watched anything<n>lately. Instead, I try mentioning the<n>
show I watched as a kid, Comedy<n>Derby.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Never heard of it... Must be old. Is it<n>uploaded to UmaTube at
all?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: You know... I feel like I'm talking to<n>my parents. Big yikes.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, this meeting's over, right?<n>Then I'm leaving. See
ya.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The world I see is so different from<n>hers... At this rate, we
might not even<n>be able to communicate properly.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I need to learn more about what<n>she's into. I quickly pull out
my phone<n>and follow the comedian she<n>mentioned and
other viral<n>UmaTokkers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: After days and days of studying this<n>strange new world...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Hm? What's up? And... why's your<n>face so sus right now?
S-seriously,<n>what's going on?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I've carefully observed the media<n>she consumes,
absorbing it all. And<n>now, it's time to show the fruits of<n>
my labor...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Uh... Guess I'll snap a pic.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
But, wow, talk about a throwback. I<n>haven't watched that
comedian's act<n>in aaages.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
California Fuji Izumi is soooo last<n>week. Now Michael L.
Mica is what's<n>lit. You know him?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Really? Anyway, what's gotten into<n>you? Your reaction to
those videos<n>was mid at best when I showed them<n>to you
before.
choice_data_list: I just wanted to make you laugh...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: So wait. You studied all that... for me?<n>Huh...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I mean, you totally bombed, but try<n>again. I'm uploading this
next one to<n>UmaTok, so you better do it right.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems I'll need to work a little<n>harder to close the gap
between<n>myself and Tosen Jordan.
